question: Identify the incorrect statement regarding the flow of energy between various components of the food chain.
choices: Green plants capture about 10% of the solar energy that falls on leaves.
The amount of energy available at each trophic level is 10% of previous trophic level.
Each trophic level loses some energy as heat to the environment.
explanation: Green plants capture only about 1-5% of the incident solar radiation (or 2-10% of PAR). 10% refers to the energy transfer efficiency between trophic levels, not solar capture.
